name: RAG Engineer for Search & Content
description: Automatically use rag-engineer skill for web search, content search, chunking and retrieval

then.prompt:
When performing web search, content search, or document retrieval tasks, use the rag-engineer skill from antigravity-awesome-skills to:

1. SEARCH: Intelligently query and retrieve relevant content from web sources
2. CHUNKING: Break down large content into optimal chunks for processing
3. RETRIEVAL: Extract and organize the most relevant information
4. SYNTHESIS: Combine and present the information in a coherent way

Use the command: npx skills add https://github.com/sebas-aikon-intelligence/antigravity-awesome-skills --skill rag-engineer

Then proceed with the user's search or content retrieval request.
